full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 459 Filed 11/15/21 Page 28 of 43

1 THE COURT: Sure.
2 MS. STERNHEIM: I apologize.
3 Judge, I apologize. There's some ringing in the phone.
4 phone.
5 I just would like, if the Court would permit me -- I'm not able to find the document, but I would ask that
6 Mr. Everdell be able to speak on this issue.
7
8 THE COURT: OK.
9 MS. STERNHEIM: Very brief.
10 THE COURT: OK.
11 I will ask my deputy if Mr. Everdell can be unmuted, please.
12
13 MS. STERNHEIM: Judge, I'm prepared to proceed. I've found the document.
14
15 THE COURT: Thanks.
16 MS. STERNHEIM: OK?
17 THE COURT: I think whatever you're doing when you turn away from the phone, Ms. Sternheim, may create that feedback.
18
19 MS. STERNHEIM: I apologize. I apologize.
20
21 THE COURT: All right.
22 MS. STERNHEIM: Very briefly, we would ask for the following inclusions in the Court's questionnaire. With regard to No. 24(b), we would ask that the Court include, and please include, the crimes that were involved.
23
24
25
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00007000
